node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2019 年12 月 22 日至 2020 年 6 月 30 日曾到印度，6 月 30 日出現發燒及流鼻水症狀，抵港後由檢疫中心送院。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health, was in India between December 22, 2019 and June 30, 2020. He developed fever and running nose on June 30, and was hospitalised from quarantine centre upon return to Hong Kong.
